titles.title: Weather Service Modernization Review Act of 1994
A bill to provide for an independent review of the implementation of the National Implementation Plan for modernization of the National Weather Service at specific sites, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S12967)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 9/19/1994--Introduced. Weather Service Modernization Review Act of 1994 - Directs the Secretary of Commerce to: (1) ensure that the implementation of the National Implementation Plan (Plan) for modernization of the National Weather Service does not result in service degradation in any specific geographic area; and (2) provide for an independent review of the Plan by the National Research Council of the National Academy of Sciences.
